alert.note: Alert for Dickey; Foster; La Moure; Stutsman (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 9:23PM CST until January 19 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST THURSDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, blowing snow. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. * WHERE...Dickey, Foster, LaMoure and Stutsman Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until Noon CST Thursday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until Midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility through the remainder of this evening. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. Be prepared for rapidly deteriorating visibility in blowing snow. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Use caution while outdoors. Wear appropriate clothing.
